title: AT Kupyansk Directive Russian Army Shelled Sinkivka, Petropavlivka, Ivanovka, Stepova Novoselevka of OF Harkiv region. Russians ...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Petropavlivka, Ivanivka, Stepova Novoselivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Petropavlivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
